Description: The person to your left flips for you on your next turn.
Perform your best impression of another player.
You must play with your opposite (non-dominant) hand. This includes when drinking.
You can place your thumb on the edge of the table at any time. Every other player must do the same. Last to do so drinks.
You must constantly interrupt people when they are speaking.
You can choose any player at the table to play a round of Truth or Dare with.
Do 20 sit-ups or 10 sit-ups and drink 1.
You must sit under the table, including when flipping for your turn.
You must speak like a pirate with one eye closed.
You must speak like Cleveland on Family Guy.
Place an object on your head as a hat (i.e a lamp shade). It can not be a hat.
Do 10 pushups
You must say “Gigiddy Gigiddy” at the end of every sentence.
You can not speak and must mime everything.
You can only talk to inanimate objects (not people).
You must insult the person to your left and compliment the person to your right.
You must refer to yourself in the 3rd person
You can randomly challenge players to arm wrestle, loser drinks
You must pick another player and become physically connected to them. (i.e hold hands, lock arms, touch their head, etc.)

Pick an object or person that a player must flip their quarter from behind. (i.e the island, John, that lamp).

-Remember a player continues to flip if they can’t get their quarter on the board.
Your marker or pen becomes your microphone and you must speak into it whenever you talk.
Before each turn you must yell: “Mom, where’s the meatloaf?! God!”
You must speak with a flamboyant lisp.
You pretend there is a little green man who sits on the rim of your cup. You must remove him before you drink and replace him when you are done.

Rule Name: Talk to a penis, not your own
Description: When you speak you must lean over and talk to the crotch of another player.
When talking you must make color commentary statements about game play in an announcers voice.
your joints all become locked and can not bend, including when you’re sitting in a chair.
No player may answer a question from the question master. That player must respond by asking a question back to the master or another player. This continues until a player answers a question.

You must put your finger under your nose and keep it there.

*Bonus - if you draw a mustache with a marker then you can give 1 drink to someone each round.
You must randomly award points at the beginning of every sentence.
You must wink at the end of every sentence.
You must speak everything in a baby voice
You turn into a robot.
Put something on the ground and perform a Mexican Hat Dance around it.
All swears are replaced with the Smurf. (i.e “No Smurfing way! or Smurf off!”).
You must say “in the butt” at the end of every sentence.
The next person takes their turn by sitting on your lap.
Sing a song for the audience.
You can’t say any 4-letter curse words.
Leave your quarter or object on the board. If another player’s flip touches your piece you must drink.
You can challenge anyone to Rock, paper, scissors. Wager an amount of drinks up to 6.
Drink every time you make eye contact with someone.
Player must sit in a specific place or object as determined by the player to the left.  (i.e the corner, dog cage, the bathroom)
You must keep your elbows on the table at all times.
Make a rowing motion, all other players must do the same. Last to do so drinks.
You must bark like a dog instead of speaking.
You must get a beer for anyone when they run out.
Your hands must stay completely limp from your wrists down. You must also poke others with your limp hands.
Pull your elbows into your shirt sleeves. All movement and drinking must be done with your arms still in your sleeves. If you do not have sleeves hold your elbows to your sides.
Speak in a gruff Dark Knight voice like Christian Bale.
Pick a peer stance to remain in until your next rule.   Also known as Captain Morgan.
Every time you drink, keep your pinky out.
You must speak in an Irish accent.
You can’t speak again until your name is said 3 times.
You must steal the drink of the person to the right of you.
Every player must drink 1 for every article of clothing they are wearing that has that color.
Everyone in the gender opposite of your own drinks.
Pick another player to be partnered with. You drink when they drink, they drink when you drink.
Become another persons shadow. You drink when they drink, you do not drink when you drink.
Trade places with the player to your left.
Drink 1 for every player playing the game.
